title: Flat Out in a Porsche 917 - Shakedown for Rennsport Reunion V
description:
The legend: the Porsche 917. The driver: Patrick Long. The only North American employed as a factory racing driver by Porsche. Wins: 24 Hours of LeMans class winner, 3-time ALMS champion, Rolex 24 at Daytona, 12 Hours of Sebring, and class winner at the 2013 Baja 1000.

That's what it takes to drive this car.


Rennsport Reunion V is not just a gathering of the most significant Porsche race cars ever to roll on the Earth, but a reunion of the irreplaceable people who designed, engineered, and drove them to victory.
tags: Porsche 917, Le Mans, motorsport, racing, endurance racing, Rennsport
